name: hypocritically
content:
Add to word list

in a way that shows that particular moral beliefs you say you have are not sincere: People who hypocritically claim to despise scandal still buy tabloid newspapers to read about it. He behaved hypocritically by blaming the other side for the collapse of talks. See
hypocritical
More examplesFewer examplesIt is widely believed that he hypocritically switched tax policies to pick up votes.He hypocritically accused his opponent of being inconsistent on the issues.Designers hypocritically claim they are aiming for the trendy youth market.
